email.body:
Secure channel open.
Your loadout has been configured. Run gp_debug to verify system state.
The test node is on your map. It runs all port tiers.
Crack sequence: 1. overload (proxy) 2. analyze, solve GATEKEEPER (firewall) 3. SSHcrack / FTPBounce / WebServerWorm (vanilla) 4. SSHcrack_v2 / FTPBounce_v2 / WebServerWorm_v2 (V2) 5. SSHcrack_v3 / FTPBounce_v3 / WebServerWorm_v3 (V3) 6. porthack
V3 executables require key files. Check your /home — they are pre-loaded for M1 testing.
-- SENTINEL

missionStart.AddIRCMessage: GP loadout confirmed. Test node online. Run gp_debug to verify.
